about_section.title: About Me
introduction: I like programming, in fact I find it very entertaining. I am passionate computing engineer. I am very interested in Software Engineering and due to this I am constantly looking for Information related to this area to put it into practice.

I received my engineer degree from Universidad Simón Bolívar (Venezuela) in 2012 where I studied Computer Science. Here I learned how to use a lot of programming languages and many types of tools which could help me to do my job. After graduating, I had been working in the finance industry for 2 years. Currently, I am working at Smartmatic, a company which develop electoral solutions for governments. I decided to make this change because I wanted to do somehting more interesting.

In 2015, I participated in the Global Urban Datafest: Smart Cities Hackathon and won a prize for technical assistance along with my teammates to promote the project in which we participated. That experience was great opportunity to know people who is related to another careers beyond IT and learn to work with them to carry out a personal project.

I have great skills in areas related to software development due to my past experience working as .NET and Java developer. I am also highly proficient in C/C++ and JavaScript Programming. Moreover, I am constantly looking for new technologies, I like to try new things and find how to use them in my work. I have been developing an API in Node.js and, after all the learning process, I can say I like it. Similarly, I had tried another programming languages and frameworks that you can review in my resume.

I want to work on interesting and challenging projects. I want to have new opportunities to develop my skills and learn new ones. I do not want to work in a place where the most important is the time you spend sitting in a chair doing nothing. I believe It is cool when a company understands that developers can be more productive if they have freedom to do their job without following offices schedules.

I am happy working independently or in a close team environment, and apply a positive attitude to every task I undertake. I want to be part of a team with clear vision and enthusiasm that want to create the best technology for people.
So you let me work with you?

jobs.description: As member of Electoral Solutions Departament, I had been involved in multiple projects for electoral events in Venezuela, Argentina, Philippines, and Uganda among others in the different company products. I have worked as a Java developer for server side applications as well as a C/C++ developer for client side platform (voting machines).

As Lead Programmer, I was responsible both in design and underlying architecture for the company's new software solutions. I develop database components based on MS SQL Server and a web service layer on .NET Framework.
I worked at Department of Design and Development (Workflow area). Here, I develop modules and applications for office network based on .NET Framework (Back-End) and HTML/CSS/JavaScript (Front-End).

I worked at Department of Technology. Here, I had to develop a mobile app for manage a kind of electronic health record related to its clients and other process like laboratory exams and ambulance services.
I was giving support to Department of Computing and Information Technology. My work involved imparting practical classes in C programming language and user interfaces.
I worked at Department of Mathematics. My work involved imparting practical classes of topics previously learnt in the course.

skills.description: I had been developing apps for 3 years using C#, Entity Framework and MVC 3/4
I had developed many programs to do some specific task in Unix environments also I had used it in videogame development based on Open GL
JDBC, JSP Servlets, Hibernate, Struts, Java ME (SDK Android/BlackBerry)
I used it for developing asynchronous calls at client level and Front-End development
I had been involved in RESTful API development using Express
MS SQL Server, Oracle SQL, PostgresSQL, MySQL, MongoDB
I used it for web design
